description_body:
Imagine living only 3km from the Brisbane CBD whilst experiencing peaceful, leafy Parkside views in a spacious home. Nestled in a quiet street of Milton next door to Frew Park, this stylish two-storey property has been elegantly renovated as a multi-generational home with open plan living spaces. Presenting amazing living opportunities and expansive outdoor areas, the residence is a private paradise just moments from the Brisbane CBD. Enjoy the convenient proximity to local shops, cafes, schools and Brisbaneâs most iconic landmarks. 

The renovated pre-war Queenslander features a separate entry to the lower and upper levels, creating opportunities for large families, home business and separate living opportunities. The lower floor has been recently updated, comprising three bedrooms plus a study, two bathrooms, generous open-plan living, dining and full kitchen. The bedrooms have built-in cabinetry, the master inclusive of a walk-through double wardrobe and private ensuite. The level flows out to your own incredible outdoor living area incorporating a sizeable covered patio and garden, perfect for entertaining or time with the family. 

Upstairs hosts three bedrooms, two bathrooms and a gorgeous living space that includes a gourmet kitchen, immense lounge, dining and sitting room. The wrap-around balcony connects to the back deck, allowing you to take in the tranquil natural surrounds privatised by tall gum trees. The master suite offers a walk-in robe and private ensuite, the second and third bedrooms accessing the main bathroom. The wrap-around deck has a walkway that leads to an additional and appealing bonus, a separate shed space that has a myriad of multi-purpose uses from shed, games room or home business. 

The home has been updated through high-grade stainless steel appliances, split-system and ducted air-conditioning, security screens, new fencing and fresh paint both inside and out. Additional features include an abundance of lock-up storage, a workshop, covered parking for two vehicles and internal laundry facilities on both levels. The two floors offer multi-generational living via a lockable internal door and dual entrances, allowing your imagination to run wild with the countless possibilities of this prestigious and immaculately kept residence. 

In catchment of Milton State School and Kelvin Grove College, you will also have your pick of some of Brisbaneâs most elite private schools such as Stuartholme School, Brisbane Girls Grammar and Brisbane Grammar School. Easily accessible public transport makes travel to the CBD, SouthBank, University of Queensland and local amenities a breeze. There may never be such a diverse opportunity in an advantageous location such as this again. A rare opportunity - inspect today.
